title: Any idea what this font may be??
content:
My thanks in advance for any ideas as to what this font might be.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804043736im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Font_4437.jpg)
author: mosaic101

comments.content:
Comic Sans.  
Next time do IDs here: [http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804043736/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid")

hhp
Ha! Comic Sans should ever look so good.
